description:
With two office locations in Minnesota, Bradshaw & Bryant, PLLC, is dedicated to seeking justice on behalf of our clients. Through our office in Waite Park, we serve residents in the St. Cloud area and throughout central Minnesota by offering a full range of services aimed at protecting the rights and liberties of accident victims as well as those facing criminal charges.

As part of our firm's personal injury practice, we provide aggressive advocacy and support to our clients as they seek compensation following accidents caused by the negligence of others. Handling all types of personal injury cases, we regularly represent clients who have legal needs related to:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Uninsured drivers
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Boating and skiing accidents
  • Swimming accidents
  • Amusement park and concert venue accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Defective products
  • Construction accidents
  • Wrongful death
  • Injuries as a result of sexual assault

Through our criminal defense practice, we offer effective defense strategies and vigorous courtroom representation for our clients charged with a wide range of criminal offenses, including:

  • DUI
  • Theft and burglary
  • Drug charges
  • Homicide
  • Domestic violence
  • Sex crimes
  • Computer crimes
  • Property crimes
  • Violent crimes, including assault and battery
  • White collar crimes

For more than 30 years, Bradshaw & Bryant, PLLC, has helped the citizens of Minnesota with their most important and pressing legal challenges by providing high-quality, experienced and personalized service. If you have a legal need related to one of our practice areas, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
